###New Jersey Focus Tree###
###Do not edit###
focus_tree = {
    id = newjersey_focus
    continuous_focus_position = { x = 20 y = 1700 }
    country = {
        factor = 0
        modifier = {
            add = 10
            tag = NJN
        }
    }

    ###Diplomacy Section###

    focus = {
        id = njdiplo1
        icon = GFX_goal_generic_attack_allies
        text = "Our Position"
        x = 9
        y = 0
        cost = 10
        completion_reward = {
            add_political_power = 200
        }
    }

#Done^

    focus = {
        id = njdiplo2.1
        icon = GFX_focus_generic_strike_at_democracy1
        text = "Strength"
        x = 4
        y = 1
        cost = 10
        prerequisite = {
            focus = njdiplo1 }
mutually_exclusive = { focus = njdiplo2.2 }
completion_reward = {
army_experience = 20
add_war_support = 0.05
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = PAP modifier = Buildup }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = NYN modifier = Buildup }
}
}

#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo2.2
icon = GFX_goal_tripartite_pact
text = "Safety"
x = 13
y = 1
cost = 10
prerequisite = { focus = njdiplo1 }
mutually_exclusive = { focus = njdiplo2.1 }
completion_reward = {
add_political_power = 100
add_stability = 0.1
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = PAP modifier = Unimposing }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = NYN modifier = Unimposing }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = DED modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = MDM modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = WVW modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = OHO modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = CTC modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = MAM modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = VTV modifier = Friendly }
}
}

#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo3.1
icon = GFX_goal_generic_axis_build_infantry
text = "The Army of New Jersey"
x = 3
y = 2
cost = 10
prerequisite = { focus = njdiplo2.1 }
completion_reward = {
army_experience = 10
add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = 5000 producer = NJN}
add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = artillery_equipment amount = 1000 producer = NJN}
add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = support_equipment amount = 1000 producer = NJN}
}
}

#Done^

				name = land_doc_bonus
				bonus = 1.0
				uses = 2
				category = land_doctrine
        }
        add_manpower = -5000
}

#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo7.2
icon = GFX_goal_tfv_generic_tech_sharing
text = "Unified Research"
x = 10
y = 6
cost = 10
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo6.3}
completion_reward = {
NJN = { add_to_tech_sharing_group = odec_research }
every_other_country = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = NJN }
				add_to_tech_sharing_group = odec_research
			}
}
}

#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo8.2
icon = GFX_goal_generic_production
text = "Joint Industrial Development"
x = 9
y = 7
cost = 10
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo7.2}
completion_reward = {
NJN = { random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = industrial_complex
						size > 3
						include_locked = yes
					}
				}
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
				add_building_construction = {
					type = industrial_complex
					level = 4
					instant_build = yes
				}
        } }
every_other_country = {
	limit = { is_in_faction_with = NJN }
random_owned_controlled_state = {

        limit = {
          free_building_slots = {
            building = industrial_complex
            size > 3
            include_locked = yes
          }
        }
        add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
        add_building_construction = {
          type = industrial_complex
          level = 4
          instant_build = yes
        }
        }
}
}
}
#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo8.3
icon = GFX_goal_generic_navy_doctrines_tactics
text = "Joint Naval Development"
x = 11
y = 7
cost = 10
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo7.2}
completion_reward = {
add_tech_bonus = {
				name = uk_waves_focus
				bonus = 1.0
				uses = 3
        category = naval_doctrine}
every_other_country = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = NJN }
        add_tech_bonus = {
        				name = uk_waves_focus
        				bonus = 1.0
        				uses = 3
                category = naval_doctrine}
			}
}
}

#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo9.4
icon = GFX_goal_generic_navy_battleship
text = "Caribbean Dominance"
x = 13
y = 8
cost = 10
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo8.4}
completion_reward = {
random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = dockyard
						size > 2
						include_locked = yes
					}
				}
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
				add_building_construction = {
					type = dockyard
					level = 3
					instant_build = yes
				}
        }
        random_owned_controlled_state = {
        				limit = {
        					free_building_slots = {
        						building = dockyard
        						size > 2
        						include_locked = yes
        					}
        				}
        				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
        				add_building_construction = {
        					type = dockyard
        					level = 3
        					instant_build = yes
        				}
                }
                random_owned_controlled_state = {
                				limit = {
                					free_building_slots = {
                						building = dockyard
                						size > 2
                						include_locked = yes
                					}
                				}
                				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
                				add_building_construction = {
                					type = dockyard
                					level = 3
                					instant_build = yes
                				}
                        }
add_ideas = trade_dominance
}
}

#Add all^

}
}
}

#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo11
icon = GFX_focus_smiling_buddha
text = "Triumph"
x = 4
y = 10
cost = 10
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo10.1}
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo10.2}
available = {
Or = {
				PAP = { has_capitulated = yes }
        OR = {
				PAP = { is_subject_of = NJN }
        OR = {
				NOT = {
					any_country = {
						original_tag = PAP
						exists = yes
					}
				}
        OR ={
        NYN = { has_capitulated = yes }
        OR = {
        NYN = { is_subject_of = NJN }
        OR = {
        NOT = {
          any_country = {
            original_tag = NYN
            exists = yes
          }
        }
		}
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
completion_reward = {
country_event = newjersey.9
}
}
#Add all^

focus = {
id = njdiplo12
icon = GFX_focus_usa_recruit_the_free_corps

y = 11
cost = 10
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo11 focus = njdiplo10.3}
completion_reward = {
every_owned_state = {
    add_core_of = NJN
  }
}
}
